item.title: Please! i need help whit graphic! (attack style)
item.dc:creator: @LeScape LeScape
item.description:
@LeScape wrote:

find

public int GetAttackAnim(int id)

and use this form to add a new piece:

if (id == x) {
return y;

x = the item id
y = the animation id
to make it change dependant on attack style

if (id == x) {
if (FightType == 1) {
return y1;
}
if (FightType == 2) {
return y2;
}
if (FightType == 3) {
return y3;
}
if (FightType == 4) {
return y4;
}
}

x is the weapon id still
fighttype 1 is the first type on the list, and it goes down. y1-4 are the ids to the corrosponding fight type.
